question: hi I am 25 years old with no prior history of asthma or any respiratory or heart disease. this is my second pregnancy and with my first one I had preeclampsia...so far with this one I am doing fine and have not been experiencing any of the symptoms associated with preeclampsia but I have been experiencing a tightness in my chest accompanied by a shortness of breathe. what are some of the possible causes for these symptoms???
title: 26 weeks pregnant tightness in chest
